meanings.definition: Lacking tact or diplomacy; insensitive in dealing with others.
meanings.sent1: It was untactful of him to make rude comments during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She realized her untactful words had hurt her friend's feelings.
meanings.sent3: His untactful joke at the party fell flat and made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The untactful way he handled the situation was like a bull in a china shop.
meanings.sent5: The untactful email he sent spread like wildfire, causing chaos in the office.
